sqlMap.statement: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY EAISEVRINSTNCNAME) ROWNO, EAISEVRINSTNCNAME, EAISEVRIP, SEVRLSNPORTNAME, FLOVRSEVRNAME, HOSTNAME FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBP03 ) ORGTABLE WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#

SELECT EAISEVRINSTNCNAME AS "EAISVRINSTNM", EAISEVRIP AS "EAISVRIP", SEVRLSNPORTNAME AS "EAISVRLSNPORT", FLOVRSEVRNAME AS "FAILOVERSVRNM", HOSTNAME AS "HOSTNAME" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIBP03 WHERE ROWNUM = 1
